3: All these twists and turns... so annoying! And there's a whole bunch of Corrupted to beat up around every corner!
Why are you in such a hurry? We need to take it slow.
I—Hey, wait, what's that glittering over there?
You glance towards where Nanami is pointing and see an old, battered supply crate, with something glinting nailed onto it.
It's a note... written on a chocolate wrapper.
Those jerkwads who stole my kingdom are finally gone! At least it looks like it...
They must've brought my old man and my mom with 'em. Eh, I was tired of them telling me what to do anyways!
Next, I gotta bring some weapons and search around the fort to make sure they didn't leave too many guards around.
Looks like whoever lived here left a note.
Yeah... Guess we'll have to continue searching.
There's still a long way to go before we reach the actual interior of the fortress.
